mapper.select: SELECT post_no, member_id, post_content, movieNm,image, post_date FROM filmbox_post
SELECT DISTINCT(movieNm), image FROM filmbox_member fm INNER JOIN filmbox_rev fr ON fm.member_id = fr.member_id INNER JOIN filmbox_movie fv ON fr.movieCd= fv.movieCd WHERE fm.member_id =#{member_id};
mapper.insert: insert into filmbox_post ( member_id , post_content , movieNm , image , post_date) values(#{member_id}, #{post_content}, #{movieNm}, #{image}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS post_no, post.* FROM (SELECT fm.movieNm, COUNT(fm.movieNm) AS post_count,fm.image AS image FROM filmbox_post fp INNER JOIN filmbox_movie fm ON fp.movieNm = fm.movieNm GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 5) post WHERE (@rownum:=0)=0
